com.sponsorpay.publisher.mbe.mediation

Class SPBrandEngageMediationAdapter<V extends SPMediationAdapter>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sponsorpay.publisher.mbe.mediation.SPBrandEngageMediationAdapter<V>

  • public abstract class SPBrandEngageMediationAdapter<V extends SPMediationAdapter>
extends java.lang.Object

    Base class for mobile BrandEngage Mediation adapter

    This class defines the required specific methods to every adapter and provides convenience methods handling timeouts, validation and events notifications. The SPMediationCoordinator will communicate the results back to the SPBrandEngageClient.

      • getMediationAdapter

        public V getMediationAdapter()

      • videosAvailable

        public abstract void videosAvailable(android.content.Context context)
        Checks whether there are videos available to start playing. This is expected to be asynchronous, and the answer should be delivered through the sendValidationEvent(SPTPNVideoValidationResult).

      • startVideo

        public abstract void startVideo(android.app.Activity parentActivity)
        Instructs the wrapped video network SDK to start playing a video.
        Parameters:
        parentActivity - If the wrapped SDK needs a parent activity, it can use the provided one.

      • videosAvailable

        public void videosAvailable(android.content.Context context,
                   SPMediationValidationEvent event,
                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> contextData)
        Method called from the SPMediationCoordinator to check for videos availability for this network. The result of the method is returned asynchronously to the provided SPMediationValidationEvent. This method also stores the listener and the context data information to send it back when needed and starts the validation timeout.
        Parameters:
        context - The activity context
        event - The SPMediationValidationEvent to be notified.
        contextData - The context data used in this request

      • startVideo

        public void startVideo(android.app.Activity parentActivity,
              SPMediationVideoEvent event,
              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> contextData)
        Method called from the SPMediationCoordinator to start videos engagement for this network. The video status is returned asynchronously to the provided SPMediationVideoEvent. This method also stores the listener and the context data information to send it back when needed and starts the video validation timeout.
        Parameters:
        parentActivity - The parent activity
        event - The SPMediationVideoEvent to be notified.
        contextData - The context data used in this request
